name: RedEyeAR
description:
RedEyeAr is a Arcade shooter where you shoot down devil planes and let the angel planes live in AR. Made for AGBIC 18 with the case RedEye from Brent Ashe as Inspiration 

Devil planes that fly faster and change direction more often are free. Destroy them by tapping on them!

Kill an angel plane and you will suffer losing souls
